channel.title: Home Page
channel.description: Business News: Get latest news on share market, personal finance news, economy news, stock market updates, company news, election results, politics news, breaking news at Business Standard. Catch all the latest Nifty Sensex news live updates.

item.description: The airport, about 200 miles north of Boston, shut down after the crash

item.title: India, EU concludes negotiations for FTA successfully: Commerce Secy
item.description: Government officials said ratification of the pact is likely to take another six months, clearing the way for the agreement to come into force in early 2027

item.title: PropEquity parent to set up real estate school with Cambridge by 2027
item.description: PropEquity parent PE Analytics will partner with the University of Cambridge to set up India's first real estate school in Gurugram, with academic operations planned for 2027

item.title: Banking ops to be hit on Tuesday as unions strike for 5-day work week
item.description: With banks remaining closed on January 25 (Sun) and January 26 (Republic Day), the strike on Tuesday will result in a disruption of branch-level services for three consecutive days

item.title: Canada PM Mark Carney may visit India in March; CEPA trade talks to begin
item.description: New Delhi and Ottawa are preparing to formally launch CEPA trade negotiations, with a possible March visit by Canadian PM Mark Carney expected to yield deals on energy, AI, critical minerals
